data.title: A Main to A Site Double Shock Dart Post Plant
data.description: This is a good spot to shoot two Shock Darts to kill anyone defusing the spike during post plant.

data.title: A Restaurant to A Art Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good Recon Bolt to scan A Art and get a pick on enemies pushing into A Art.

data.title: Mid Shops to Mid Doors Recon Bolt
data.description: A good Recon Bolt to scan behind Mid Doors from Mid Shops allowing your team to take control of the area.

data.title: Attacker Side Spawn to Mid Doors Recon Bolt
data.description: This is a good Recon Bolt to assist your team going into Mid Doors and also allowing you to peek from Mid Window or hold for an A Main push.

data.title: A Main to A Site Owl Drone & A Main Recon Dart
data.description: This is a good combo to effectively use your utility as Sova to gain control of A Main and then clear the common corners on A Site for when your team begins to execute.

data.title: Attacker Side Spawn to Back B Site Recon Arrow
data.description: A good recon arrow from Attacker Side Spawn that lands at the back of B Site allowing you to scan a majority of the common angles on the site.
